text: This is an flier depicting an ancient Greek soldier facing off against a viking.  Below it is the text "From kopeshes to arming swords, we have all your arms and armor needs!"
"Got every kinda sword I need, except a spatha.  And an urumi.  And maybe a szabla too."
"whys it called a heater shield anyway?  only heats if i light it on fire."
"OW IT IS TOO DAMN COLD TO BE A HOPLITE"
"I wonder if painting my longsword black and giving it a baddass name will make it cut better."
//: Reference to Dusk, the debug item in the mod.

text: "Copper, tin, what the hell am I gonna make outta bronze anyway?"
